Leave us a Google review!
(Time: 45mins)

Hi Blake and Kosta,

Just confirming that we've updated the Google Reviews and YouTube Smash Balloons.

I've attached the receipts, and the charges will be reflected in your account.

Regarding the YouTube integration, Could you please send us the channel link that should be included in the feed?

Hi Blake and Kosta,

I hope you had a great weekend

Can you send us the logins from your trustpilot to see if there is a custom configuration that we need to copy across?

Hi Blake,

It will be easier for you guys to do it from your own account as you also will be able to setup the billing as well for these plugins.

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

Just want to confirm you can do this on our behalf?

Thank you.

Blake Wilson

Sales Manager

HammerHire

Mob: 0417 411 237

Email: blake@hammerhire.com.au

32 Williamson Rd , Ingleburn NSW 2565

http://www.hammerhire.com.au/

Leave us a Google review!

Hi Kosta and Blake,

I hope all is well and apologies for the delay!

We initially mentioned that we’d process it on our end, but after checking in with the plugin developers, they advised it’s best to upgrade the plan directly from the client’s side. This keeps everything under your control and ensures smoother management going forward.

Here are the steps to upgrade:
  1. Log in to your Trustindex account at trustindex.io
  2. In the top-right corner, click on your profile icon and go to “Billing / Subscription.”
  3. Choose the plan you’d like to upgrade to — we recommend the Single Plan ($65/year) for your setup.
  4. Complete the payment process.

Once upgraded, just let us know — we’ll help set up the widget and make sure it integrates smoothly on your website.

Hi Joel,

Please advise where we are at with this...

Cheers,
Kosta

Can you not just upload the plugin from your end, we are not devs so not sure what you are after?

Hi Joel,

Thanks for providing.

blake@hammerhire.com.au - Can you advise on whether or not you would like to use the paid version? I recommend using the Single - $65/ year option as it will automatically pull through google reviews.

Please reply all so that Joel knows what to do.

Cheers,

Hi Kosta,

Sure here is the price link and price list.
https://www.trustindex.io/prices/
Single - $65/ year
  • 1 domains
  • Unlimited widgets
  • Unlimited views
  • Unlimited reviews
  • 133 review platforms
  • Automatic review download
  • 1 year of subscription and updates
Pro - $125/ year
  • 5 domains
  • Unlimited widgets
  • Unlimited views
  • Unlimited reviews
  • 133 review platforms
  • Automatic review download
  • 1 year of subscription and updates
Ultimate - $349/ year
  • Unlimited domains
  • Unlimited widgets
  • Unlimited views
  • Unlimited reviews
  • 133 review platforms
  • Automatic review download
  • 1 year of subscription and updates

Hi Joel,

Can you please advise what the pro version cost is?

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

Yes, this is the plugin that the site is using.

(Installed) For Free version, you can get manual reviews every 10days.
https://hammerhire.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=wp-reviews-plugin-for-google%2Fsettings.php&tab=my-reviews

(Not installed) For Pro version, "Automatic review update, creating unlimited review widgets, downloading and displaying all reviews, 133 review platforms available!"

Hi Joel,

Can you use a plugin like this that automatically pulls across the reviews??

https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-reviews-plugin-for-google/

Cheers,
Kosta
